Text: RE Releases Cc Louise Thanks so much for your speedy reply I will pass your comments on to Dave Walker in Media Relations I included Kevin because he is listed with you Greg and John on a management slide If there are others who should be included on Gregs core management team for the announcement please let me know who they are and their titles Please also let me know if it is inappropriate to include Kevin If there is an org chart that might be helpful too It would allow us to be as inclusive as possible without making the announcement too long Thanks again Claudia Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday February PM To Robinson Claudia Petrie James UBS Eber Louis UBS Brady Penny UBS Keily Ruth UBS Mitchell Nikki UBS Lloyd AndrewD UBS Hollis Amanda UBS ODonnell Pat UBS Dow Colette UBS Martin Audrey UBS Cc Bridges Mark UBS Subject RE Releases Just a couple of suggested changes to both There is a lot of confusion in the energy market as to the ownership structure of the entity Enron had previously announced that the entiy would be New Owner and Enron We need to ensure this message is corrected as clearly as possible that it is UBS owner See attached file UBSW Energy release draftdoc On the release for UBSWenergycom we do intend to trade physical gas and power immediately initially at least in the areas we can so I have removed that sentence See attached file UBSenergycomreleasedraftdoc Do you need all of the commercial MD titles or is Kevin picked out for a particular reason Thanks Louise Original Message From Robinson Claudia ENRON Sent Tuesday February PM To Petrie James UBS Eber Louis UBS Brady Penny UBS Keily Ruth UBS Mitchell Nikki UBS Forster David Lloyd AndrewD UBS Hollis Amanda UBS ODonnell Pat UBS Dow Colette UBS Shah Kal Oxley David Martin Audrey UBS Cc Bridges Mark UBS Subject FW Releases Attached for your review are drafts of two news releases one announcing the closing of the UBS Warburg Energy transaction and the other to announce the launch of UBSWenergycom The plan is to issue the closing announcement on Friday at about am New York time The other is planned for when the website officially launches which is expected on Monday Please forward your comments directly to David P Walker head of Media RelationsAmericas sometime on Wednesday Tomorrow I will send you drafts of the internal announcements for Friday and Monday The plan is to issue on Friday a global UBS Warburg email announcement from John Costas announcing the new management I need from Human Resources confirmed titles for Louise Kitchen John Lavorato and Kevin Presto In addition we plan for Friday an email from Greg Whalley to employees who have signed on with UBS Warburg Energy with Costass announcement attached Both will also be posted on UBS Warburg intranets including the integration site There will also be internal publicity on the day the website launches another email from Whalley to Energy employees and intranet articles within UBS Warburg including the integration site Please let me know if you have questions Thanks Claudia UBSenergycomreleasedraftdoc UBSW Energy release draftdoc UBSenergycomreleasedraftdoc FW Releases Cc Attached for your review are drafts of two news releases one announcing the closing of the UBS Warburg Energy transaction and the other to announce the launch of UBSWenergycom The plan is to issue the closing announcement on Friday at about am New York time The other is planned for when the website officially launches which is expected on Monday Please forward your comments directly to David P Walker head of Media RelationsAmericas sometime on Wednesday Tomorrow I will send you drafts of the internal announcements for Friday and Monday The plan is to issue on Friday a global UBS Warburg email announcement from John Costas announcing the new management I need from Human Resources confirmed titles for Louise Kitchen John Lavorato and Kevin Presto In addition we plan for Friday an email from Greg Whalley to employees who have signed on with UBS Warburg Energy with Costass announcement attached Both will also be posted on UBS Warburg intranets including the integration site There will also be internal publicity on the day the website launches another email from Whalley to Energy employees and intranet articles within UBS Warburg including the integration site Please let me know if you have questions Thanks Claudia UBSenergycomreleasedraftdoc UBSW Energy release draftdoc UBSenergycomreleasedraftdoc UBSW Energy release draftdoc Visit our website at This message RE Web content Cc Thanks Dave Everyone appreciates the help you and your team are providing Claudia Original Message From Forster David mailtoDavid NRONcom Sent Tuesday February PM To Robinson Claudia Kitchen Louise Cc Petrie James UBS Eber Louis UBS Brady Penny UBS Keily Ruth UBS Mitchell Nikki UBS Bridges Mark UBS Hollis Amanda UBS ODonnell Pat UBS Dow Colette UBS Shah Kal Lloyd AndrewD UBS Subject RE Web content Claudia Thanks for the note To avoid confusion on deadlines relating to the online system in the future please call me to discuss any deadline revisions Dave Original Message From Robinson Claudia mailto Sent Tuesday February PM To Kitchen Louise Cc Petrie James UBS Eber Louis UBS Brady Penny UBS Keily Ruth UBS Mitchell Nikki UBS Bridges Mark UBS Forster David Hollis Amanda UBS ODonnell Pat UBS Dow Colette UBS Shah Kal Lloyd AndrewD UBS Subject RE Web content Louise As you know we were told during todays Integration Committee call that Marketings and Legals text changes for the website would be accepted any time today Following the call however I was told that the noon deadline was firm but we could make minor text changes on Thursday Based on that information we forwarded partial comments to Kal Shah by noon In a late afternoon email I found out that we will not be able to complete our changes until perhaps five days after the site goes live We appreciate the pressure and long hours people in Houston are putting into getting the site up and running We applaud their efforts and do not wish to add to their burden I tell you this only to make you aware of our situation should any problems arise because of the unedited text Hopefully if anything does arise problems can be easily and quickly corrected Please call me at if you have any questions or if I can help you in any way Thank you Claudia Robinson Director Employee Communications UBS Americas Inc Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday February PM To Robinson Claudia Cc Petrie James UBS Eber Louis UBS Brady Penny UBS Keily Ruth UBS Mitchell Nikki UBS Bridges Mark UBS Hollis Amanda UBS ODonnell Pat UBS Dow Colette UBS Subject RE Web content Fine by me The site will go live this weekend in preparation for Monday morning Original Message From Robinson Claudia ENRON Sent Tuesday February PM To Shah Kal Cc Petrie James UBS Eber Louis UBS Brady Penny UBS Keily Ruth UBS Mitchell Nikki UBS Bridges Mark UBS Forster David Hollis Amanda UBS ODonnell Pat UBS Dow Colette UBS Subject FW Web content Importance High Kal Below are preliminary comments from Communications and Marketing on the Web content We will be making more minor changes on Thursday during the final review process and review the site once it goes live next week I sent comments from Legal to you earlier today Please let me know if you have questions Claudia Original Message From Halligan Laura UBS Sent Tuesday February PM To Robinson Claudia Subject Importance High Here is marked version of web text RE Web content Cc Louise As you know we were told during todays Integration Committee call that Marketings and Legals text changes for the website would be accepted any time today Following the call however I was told that the noon deadline was firm but we could make minor text changes on Thursday Based on that information we forwarded partial comments to Kal Shah by noon In a late afternoon email I found out that we will not be able to complete our changes until perhaps five days after the site goes live We appreciate the pressure and long hours people in Houston are putting into getting the site up and running We applaud their efforts and do not wish to add to their burden I tell you this only to make you aware of our situation should any problems arise because of the unedited text Hopefully if anything does arise problems can be easily and quickly corrected Please call me at if you have any questions or if I can help you in any way Thank you Claudia Robinson Director Employee RE UBS Information Cc Amy Jennifer Plunkett will order the publications and reprints for you from our fulfillment house Please let her when you need them and she will let you know if that is possible About the folders you will need to order those directly from Corporate Services Teresa Carroll Please let me know if you need anything else Regards Claudia Original Message From Fitzpatrick Amy mailtoAmy NRONcom Sent Wednesday February PM To Robinson Claudia Cc Kitchen Louise Subject UBS Information Claudia Thank you so much for responding The materials that we are looking for at each office are the following Annual Review Handbook this is the one that you mentioned to me yesterday Article reprint from Wall Street dated UBS Warburg Sizzles Despite Article reprint from AdvocateGreenwich Time The House of UBS Can you please give me an idea as to when you would be able to ship the materials to us The numbers and contact information for each location are below Houston copies of each Amy FitzPatrick Smith Street ECS Houston TX Portland copies of each Mollie Gustafson SW Salmon WTC Portland OR Calgary copies of each Nella Cappelletto rd Avenue SW Calgary Alberta TP H Also do you have any UBS Warburg folders that the materials can be placed in same numbers as request above if available Thanks Amy This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain RE Releasespst Louise I talked to Human Resources about providing more specific information for my announcement from John Costas and they referred me to you directly Here are my questions What are Gregs and your formal titles in addition to MD For example John Smith head of XYZ Group Or are they CEO COO president or something like that What are the other groups reporting into Greg in addition to Commercial Do you have a complete management team org chart that we could include in an announcement from Greg and you going only to UBS Warburg Energy employees Do you think it appropriate to include this org chart in this announcement The plan is to attach Mr Costass announcement to Gregs Thanks in advance Claudia Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday February AM To Robinson Claudia Cc ODonnell Pat UBS Dow Colette UBS Martin Audrey UBS Bridges Mark UBS Walker David P Mitchell Nikki UBS Subject RE Releases This is just commercial let me know if you want the rest See attached file UBS Warburg Energy Commercialppt Original Message From Robinson Claudia ENRON Sent Wednesday February AM To Kitchen Louise Cc Forster David ODonnell Pat UBS Dow Colette UBS Shah Kal Oxley David Martin Audrey UBS Bridges Mark UBS Walker David P Mitchell Nikki UBS Subject RE Releases Louise Thanks so much for your speedy reply I will pass your comments on to Dave Walker in Media Relations I included Kevin because he is listed with you Greg and John on a management slide If there are others who should be included on Gregs core management team for the announcement please let me know who they are and their titles Please also let me know if it is inappropriate to include Kevin If there is an org chart that might be helpful too It would allow us to be as inclusive as possible without making the announcement too long Thanks again Claudia Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday February PM To Robinson Claudia Petrie James UBS Eber Louis UBS Brady Penny UBS Keily Ruth UBS Mitchell Nikki UBS we can so I have removed that sentence See attached file UBSenergycomreleasedraftdoc Do you need all of the commercial MD titles or is Kevin picked out for a particular reason Thanks Louise Original
